crx_vn.description: The version number of the station datalogger program that was in effect at the time of the observation

surface_temperature.description: USCRN stations have multiple co-located soil sensors that record independent measurements. The soil values reported in this dataset are calculated from these multiple independent measurements. Soil moisture is the ratio of water volume over sample volume (m^3 water m^-3 soil).

relative_humidity.description: All USCRN stations now report 5-minute relative humidity averages, however the two Asheville, NC stations reported only hourly RH values until 2007-02-22.

soil_moisture_5.description: Average soil moisture at 5 cm below the surface

soil_temperature_5.description: Average soil temperature at 5 cm below the surface

wind_1_5.description: Average wind speed, in meters per second, at a height of 1.5 meters

sr_flag.description: QC flag for the average global solar radiation measurement

st_flag.description: QC flag for the surface temperature measurement

rh_flag.description: QC flag for the relative humidity measurement

wet_flag.description: QC flag for the wetness measurement

wind_flag.description: QC flag for the wind speed measurement

st_type.description: The type of infrared surface temperature measurement

tmaxerr_p.description: positive uncertainties in tmax which are related to temperature

tmaxerr_m.description: negative uncertainties in tmax which are related to temperature

tminerr_p.description: positive uncertainties in tmin which are related to temperature

tminerr_m.description: negative uncertainties in tmin which are related to temperature

crx_vn.description: The version number of the station datalogger program that was in effect at the time of the observation

t_max.description: Maximum air temperature during the hour

t_min.description: Minimum air temperature during the hour

p_calc.description: Total amount of precipitation, in mm, recorded during the hour

solarad_flag.description: QC flag for average global solar radiation. 0 denotes good data and 3 denotes erroneous data.

solarad_max_flag.description: QC flag for maximum global solar radiation. 0 denotes good data and 3 denotes erroneous data.

solarad_min_flag.description: QC flag for minimum global solar radiation. 0 denotes good data and 3 denotes erroneous data.

sur_temp.description: On 2013-01-07 at 1500 UTC, USCRN began reporting corrected surface temperature measurements for some stations. These changes  impact previous users of the data because the corrected values differ from uncorrected values. To distinguish between uncorrected (raw) and corrected surface temperature measurements, a surface temperature type field was added to the data product. The possible values of the this field are "R" to denote raw surface temperature measurements, "C" to denote corrected surface temperature measurements, and "U" for unknown/missing.

sur_temp_flag.description: QC flag for infrared surface temperature. 0 denotes good data and 3 denotes erroneous data.

sur_temp_type.description: Type of infrared surface temperature measurement

sur_temp_max_flag.description: QC flag for infrared surface temperature maximum. 0 denotes good data and 3 denotes erroneous data.

sur_temp_min_flag.description: QC flag for infrared surface temperature minimum. 0 denotes good data and 3 denotes erroneous data.

rh_hr_avg.description: Hourly relative humidity is computed from 5-minute averages in almost all cases, however the two Asheville, NC stations reported only hourly RH values until 2007-02-22.

rh_hr_avg_flag.description: QC flag for RH average. 0 denotes good data and 3 denotes erroneous data.

soil_moisture_5.description: Average soil moisture at 5 cm below the surface

soil_moisture_10.description: Average soil moisture at 10 cm below the surface

soil_moisture_20.description: Average soil moisture at 20 cm below the surface

soil_moisture_50.description: Average soil moisture at 50 cm below the surface

soil_moisture_100.description: Average soil moisture at 100 cm below the surface

soil_temp_5.description: Average soil temperature at 5 cm below the surface

soil_temp_10.description: Average soil temperature at 10 cm below the surface

soil_temp_20.description: Average soil temperature at 20 cm below the surface

soil_temp_50.description: Average soil temperature at 50 cm below the surface

soil_temp_100.description: Average soil temperature at 100 cm below the surface

tmaxerr_p.description: positive uncertainties in tmax which are related to temperature

tmaxerr_m.description: negative uncertainties in tmax which are related to temperature

tminerr_p.description: positive uncertainties in tmin which are related to temperature

tminerr_m.description: negative uncertainties in tmin which are related to temperature

tmeanerr_p.description: tmean is (tmax+tmin)/2 and the uncertianty is the average of the uncertaities of tmax and tmin (positive part using the Hourly data)

tmeanerr_m.description: tmeanerr_m, tmean is (tmax+tmin)/2 and the uncertianty is the average of the uncertaities of tmax and tmin (negative per using the Hourly data)

crx_vn.description: The version number of the station datalogger program that was in effect at the time of the observation

t_daily_mean.description: Mean air temperature calculated using the typical historical approach: (T_DAILY_MAX + T_DAILY_MIN) / 2

sur_temp_daily_type.description: Type of infrared surface temperature measurement.

rh_daily_avg.description: Relative humidity is computed from 5-minute values in almost all cases. All USCRN stations now report 5-minute averages, however the two Asheville, NC stations reported only hourly RH values until 2007-02-22.

soil_moisture_5_daily.description: Average soil moisture, in fractional volumetric water content (m^3 m^-3), at 5 cm below the surface.

soil_moisture_10_daily.description: Average soil moisture, in fractional volumetric water content (m^3 m^-3), at 10 cm below the surface.

soil_moisture_20_daily.description: Average soil moisture, in fractional volumetric water content (m^3 m^-3), at 20 cm below the surface.

soil_moisture_50_daily.description: Average soil moisture, in fractional volumetric water content (m^3 m^-3), at 50 cm below the surface.

soil_moisture_100_daily.description: Average soil moisture, in fractional volumetric water content (m^3 m^-3), at 100 cm below the surface.

soil_temp_5_daily.description: Average soil temperature, in degrees C, at 5 cm below the surface.

soil_temp_10_daily.description: Average soil temperature, in degrees C, at 10 cm below the surface.

soil_temp_20_daily.description: Average soil temperature, in degrees C, at 20 cm below the surface.

soil_temp_50_daily.description: Average soil temperature, in degrees C, at 50 cm below the surface.

soil_temp_100_daily.description: Average soil temperature, in degrees C, at 100 cm below the surface.

tmaxerr_p.description: positive uncertainties in tmax which are related to temperature

tmaxerr_m.description: negative uncertainties in tmax which are related to temperature

tminerr_p.description: positive uncertainties in tmin which are related to temperature

tminerr_m.description: negative uncertainties in tmin which are related to temperature

crx_vn_monthly.description: The version number of the station datalogger program that was in effect at the time of the observation

longitude.description: Station longitude, using WGS-84, with a precision of 4 decimal places

latitude.description: Station latitude, using WGS-84, with a precision of 4 decimal places

t_monthly_mean.description: The mean air temperature calculated using the typical historical approach of (T_MONTHLY_MAX + T_MONTHLY_MIN) / 2

sur_temp_monthly_type.description: Type of infrared surface temperature measurement

sur_temp_monthly_avg.description: Monthly maximum/minimum/average surface temperatures are the average of all available daily max/min/avg values. To be considered valid, there must be fewer than 4 consecutive values missing, and no more than 5 total values missing.
